title: Shane's chewy chocolate chip and toffee cookies
ingredients: ['170g softened unsalted butter', '200g dark brown soft sugar', '100g caster sugar', '1 egg', '1 egg yolk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g plain flour', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '150g chocolate chips', '80g fudge pieces']
